title.narrative: ADOLESCENT ENGAGEMENT & SOCIAL COHESION

description.narrative: By 2020, Turkish and refugee adolescents and youth have increased opportunities for participation, meaningful engagement and interaction with peers., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Adolescent Empowerment (Covid), Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participationBy 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participation.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, Turkish and refugee adolescents and youth have increased opportunities for participation, meaningful engagement andinteraction with peers.

description.narrative: 21,072 (11,330 girls and 9,742 boys) adolescents and young people engaged in structured social cohesion activities. 252,334 adolescents and youth participated in online and digital activities. New partnerships with two Youth Associations enabled youth-led interventions and enhanced their abilities to engage on issues affecting them. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2021
